Class GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
Actor
GameCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DamagableInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerCharacter
public class GameCharacter
extends Actor
implements DamagableInterface
A game character that deals damage when overlapped, attacks, and can be attacked.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameCharacter

      public GameCharacter​(int x, int y, int r, javax.swing.ImageIcon i, float health, float dmg, java.lang.Class<Projectile> shotType)
      Constructor for a game character
      Parameters:
      x - the x-starting position of the character
      y - the y-starting position of the character
      r - the radius of the character's hitbox.
      i - the image to represent the character on screen
      health - the health of the character
      dmg - the amount of damage dealt by the character
      shotType - the type of projectile the character shoots.

      public void killedActor​(Actor actorThatDied)
      Register the event of killing another actor. Used for adding points or a death message.
      Parameters:
      actorThatDied - the actor that has been killed by this actor.
